item.title: Change git origin
item.description:
After I delete a repository and create a new one I want to change the repository saved under origin in my local repo to the new repository location:

git remote set-url origin https://newurl.com

item.title: Indent multiple lines in visuals studio code
item.description:
I like to indent with a keyboard shortcut multiple lines of python code:

  • Indent: Highlight multiple lines and hit TAB
  • Outdent: Highlight multiple lines and hit Shift + TAB

([>> StackOverflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/40492960/
